characters: The scene shows a driver navigating a road at night. There are pedestrians and other vehicles present. A woman in a pink jacket is helping a child in the middle of the road.
summary: The vehicle is driving on a road at night. Initially, the road appears relatively clear, but as the video progresses, a woman and child appear in the middle of the road, seemingly after an accident involving a parked white car on the right side of the road. The woman is wearing a pink jacket and is helping the child. The driver needs to react quickly to avoid hitting them.
actions: The vehicle is initially driving at a moderate speed. As the woman and child become visible in the road, the driver will need to brake to avoid a collision. The driver is maintaining their lane until the obstruction appears.
key_objects: 1) Right: Parked white car, medium distance, potential obstruction. 2) Center: Woman in pink jacket and child, short distance, immediate collision risk.
